channel.title: Last One Standing on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Last One Standing on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Just One Lonely Product Still Uses Apple’s Lightning Connector—Can You Guess Which One?
item.description: After quietly moving the Magic Keyboard, Magic Mouse, and Magic Trackpad over to USB-C last year, a solitary decade-old Apple product is somehow still holding on.
